Global Variable# AVEncoderBitDepthHintKey

iOS 3.0+iPadOS 3.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.7+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 3.0+

```
let AVEncoderBitDepthHintKey: String
```
